channel.title: Runehelpers
channel.description:
[img]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd137/hidejacked/grasscopy.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt][u][i][b]Overview[/b][/i][/u][/size] Runehelpers previously known as pkmas was created in may 2008 and took just over 6 months to complete it from scratch. But now i've deleted it to start a whole new server from scratch now known as runehelpers. Since it took so long to make last time, that this time im going to get help creating this great server. Please read over the rest of this post if your interested.
[size=15pt][b][i][u]Server Details[/u][/i][/b][/size] [u]The Base[/u] The base will be made from scratch to increase popularity and speed. [u]Realease Date[/u] May, sort of like a first started coding anniversary present. [u]Hosting[/u] 12/7 server at the moment it might lagg slightly but i am upgrading ram so soon it will be a lot quicker.
[size=15pt][u][i][b]Mysql[/b][/i][/u][/size] If you want the server to be made with mysql at the top vote yes or no. Why? Well if i get mysql into the server then you will be able to view all server files and stuff on here like players online or your character files and there will be a remote on here to turn the server on and off. Think you can code mysql well pm first telling me and ill get your a job.
[size=15pt][u][i][b]Computer Specs[/b][/i][/u][/size] 512mb of Ram Xp sp3 Ram already used about 43% AMD Athlon 1900+ 1.61ghz processor
[size=15pt][i][b][u]Jobs[/u][/b][/i][/size] Logging In Walking Server.java Npchandler.java npcs.cfg item.cfg object.cfg autospawn.cfg client.java item/1/2/3/4.java all handler files.java all necessary files.java player.java playerhandler.java saving and loading
[size=15pt][u][i][b]Features[/b][/i][/u][/size] Nothing lol
[size=15pt][u][i][b]Employees[/b][/i][/u][/size]
[u]Head Of Development[/u]
[ul][li]Owner Dylan[/li] [li]Brent[/li][/ul]
[u]Main Coders[/u] 6 available
[ul][li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[u]Coder[/u] 7 available
[ul][li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[u]Advisor[/u] 5 available
[ul][li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
Advisors who take part in this server will gain moderator status on the server and coders and main coders gain administrator status and head of developments gain owner/co-owner status. There will be a command that will open a file which ill make that has all the people who helped make the server.
[size=15pt][u][i][b]Applying[/b][/i][/u][/size] Username: Coding Experience: Link to a tutorial you have made: Position you want: Will you make every bit of code yourself no help:
[size=15pt][u][i][b]Credits[/b][/i][/u][/size] (You will be on here when you take part) 0% to nobody

item.title: Runehelpers
item.dc:creator: @rockefella08 rockefella08
item.description:
@rockefella08 wrote:

[size=15pt]Overview[/size]
Runehelpers previously known as pkmas was created in may 2008 and took just over 6 months to complete it from scratch. But now i’ve deleted it to start a whole new server from scratch now known as runehelpers. Since it took so long to make last time, that this time im going to get help creating this great server. Please read over the rest of this post if your interested.

[size=15pt]Server Details[/size]
The Base
The base will be made from scratch to increase popularity and speed.
Realease Date
May, sort of like a first started coding anniversary present.
Hosting
12/7 server at the moment it might lagg slightly but i am upgrading ram so soon it will be a lot quicker.

[size=15pt]Mysql[/size]
If you want the server to be made with mysql at the top vote yes or no. Why? Well if i get mysql into the server then you will be able to view all server files and stuff on here like players online or your character files and there will be a remote on here to turn the server on and off. Think you can code mysql well pm first telling me and ill get your a job.

[size=15pt]Computer Specs[/size]
512mb of Ram
Xp sp3
Ram already used about 43%
AMD Athlon 1900+ 1.61ghz processor

[size=15pt]Jobs[/size]
Logging In
Walking
Server.java
Npchandler.java
npcs.cfg
item.cfg
object.cfg
autospawn.cfg
client.java
item/1/2/3/4.java
all handler files.java
all necessary files.java
player.java
playerhandler.java
saving and loading

[size=15pt]Features[/size]
Nothing lol

[size=15pt]Employees[/size]

Head Of Development

[ul][li]Owner Dylan[/li]
[li]Brent[/li][/ul]

Main Coders 6 available

[li][/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Advisors who take part in this server will gain moderator status on the server and coders and main coders gain administrator status and head of developments gain owner/co-owner status. There will be a command that will open a file which ill make that has all the people who helped make the server.
